glsa.title: GNUstep Base library: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in GNUstep Base library could lead to Denial of Service.

background.p: GNUstep Base library is a free software package implementing the API of the OpenStep Foundation Kit (tm), including later additions.

description.p: GNUstep Base library does not properly handle the file descriptor for logging, when run as a daemon.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted request, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GNUstep Base library users should upgrade to the latest version:
